sense.gloss: finale (of a noh song), end of an act (in jōruri or kabuki), final performance of the day (in vaudeville)
king (court card; in mekuri karuta and unsun karuta)
counter for slices (esp. thick slices), counter for cuts (of fish, meat, etc.)
appropriate, suitable, fitting, apt, proper, right, pertinent, relevant
absolutely (not), (not) at all, (none) whatsoever, without exception
to cut, to cut through, to perform (surgery)
to terminate (e.g. a conversation), to hang up (the phone), to disconnect
to punch (a ticket), to tear off (a stub)
to set (a limit), to do (something) in less or within a certain time, to issue (cheques, vouchers, etc.)
to reduce, to decrease, to discount
to shake off (water, etc.), to let drip-dry, to let drain
to act decisively, to do (something noticeable), to go first, to make (certain facial expressions, in kabuki)
to curl (a ball), to bend, to cut
to dismiss, to sack, to let go, to expulse, to excommunicate
to dig (a groove), to cut (a stencil, on a mimeograph)
to cut (the connection between two groups)
to start a fire (with wood-wood friction or by striking a metal against stone)
to draw (a shape) in the air (with a sword, etc.)
kind, gentle, considerate, generous, friendly, nice
to break, to snap, to be cut, to split, to crack
to wear out, to be worn out
to break, to burst, to collapse
to wear off, to stop working, to go dead
to expire (time limit, etc.), to run out, to become due
to run out (of stock, etc.), to be exhausted, to be used up, to be sold out, to be out of
to be broken off (e.g. of a relationship), to break up, to have severed ties, to be cut off, to be disconnected
to cut well, to be sharp
to be sharp-minded, to be keen, to be shrewd, to be quick-witted, to be able
to be short of, to drop under (a certain figure), to beat (e.g. a record time)
to get angry, to snap, to blow one's top, to lose one's temper, to flip
to be able to do completely
eager, earnest, ardent, kind, keen, acute
point of view, (different) perspective, new approach
break, end, (place to) stop, pause, milestone (e.g. in a project)
to one's heart's content, as much as one wants, as hard as one can, with all one's strength, to the best of one's ability, to the utmost, with determination, hard, heavily
to change, to exchange, to convert, to renew, to throw a switch, to replace, to switch over
to one's heart's content, as much as one wants, as hard as one can, with all one's strength, to the best of one's ability, to the utmost, with determination, hard, heavily
largely cut (e.g. of cabbage), cut into large pieces
completely using up ..., running out of ..., exhausting ...
point of agreement, common ground, interaction

sdata.j: ↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓にしてやればつけあがる。
sdata.e: Give him an inch and he'll take a yard.

sdata.j: ネタ↑切↑↓ぎ↓れになりそうだよ。
sdata.e: I'm running out of ideas.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑不屈↑↓ふくつ↓の↑精神↑↓せいしん↓で↑危機↑↓きき↓を↑切↑↓き↓り↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けられるだろう。
sdata.e: Your undaunted spirit will carry you through.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓に↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑切手↑↓きって↓を↑買↑↓か↓ってしまった。
sdata.e: You have bought more postage stamps than are necessary.

sdata.j: ↑髪↑↓かみ↓を↑切↑↓き↓ってもらった↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいよ。
sdata.e: You should get your hair cut.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓にも↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑助↑↓たす↓けてくれた。
sdata.e: You were kind to help me.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑信頼↑↓しんらい↓してよい。↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して、↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑裏切↑↓うらぎ↓らない。
sdata.e: You can rely on him. He never lets you down.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑道↑↓みち↓を↑切↑↓き↓り↑開↑↓ひら↓こうとすべきだ。
sdata.e: You should try to cut your way.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑収入↑↓しゅうにゅう↓の↑範囲↑↓はんい↓↑内↑↓ない↓で↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓するように、↑余分↑↓よぶん↓な↑支出↑↓ししゅつ↓は↑切↑↓き↓りつめなければならない。
sdata.e: You must cut down on extra expenses in order to live within your means.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑体↑↓からだ↓を↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓にしなければならない。
sdata.e: You should take better care of yourself.

sdata.j: もっと↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓にしなければだめですよ。
sdata.e: You should take better care of yourself.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなんて↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓なんだ。
sdata.e: How kind you are!

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓とあなたは↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓なのだろう。
sdata.e: How kind you are!

sdata.j: あなたはなんて↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓なんでしょう。
sdata.e: How kind you are!

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はどうやってこの↑古↑↓ふる↓い↑切手↑↓きって↓を↑手↑↓て↓に↑入↑↓い↓れたのか。
sdata.e: How did you obtain these old postage stamps?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑紙↑↓かみ↓を↑切↑↓き↓りましたか。
sdata.e: Did you cut the paper?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はこのことを↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓にしておくことが↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓だ。
sdata.e: It is important for you to keep this secret.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑友情↑↓ゆうじょう↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓にとってとても↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓だ。
sdata.e: Your friendship is most precious to me.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑杯↑↓はい↓のビジネスプラン、↑絵↑↓え↓に↑描↑↓えが↓いた↑餅↑↓もち↓にならんことを↑切↑↓せつ↓に↑望↑↓のぞ↓むよ。
sdata.e: This business plan of yours seems almost too optimistic. All I can say is I hope it's more than just wishful thinking.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑答↑↓こた↓えは↑適切↑↓てきせつ↓である。
sdata.e: Your answer is to the point.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑靴↑↓くつ↓はすり↑切↑↓き↓れた。
sdata.e: My shoes are worn out.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓には↑星↑↓ほし↓がたくさんでていてとても↑数↑↓かぞ↓え↑切↑↓き↓れない。
sdata.e: There are so many stars in the sky, I can't count them all.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓には↑数↑↓かぞ↓え↑切↑↓き↓れないほど↑星↑↓ほし↓が↑出↑↓で↓ている。
sdata.e: There are more stars in the sky than I can count.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓に↑行↑↓い↓けばその５０ドルの↑小切手↑↓こぎって↓を↑現金↑↓げんきん↓に↑換↑↓か↓えてくれる。
sdata.e: The bank will cash your fifty dollar check.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓が↑援助↑↓えんじょ↓の↑手↑↓て↓をさしのべるのを↑拒絶↑↓きょぜつ↓したら、あなたはどうして↑資金繰↑↓しきんぐ↓りの↑危機↑↓きき↓を↑乗↑↓の↓り↑切↑↓き↓るのか。
sdata.e: How do you expect to weather the financial storm when the bank refuses to extend a helping hand?

sdata.j: ↑金曜日↑↓きんようび↓↑締↑↓し↓め↑切↑↓き↓りのプロジェクトに↑追↑↓お↓われています。
sdata.e: I'm tied up with a project that is due Friday.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きん↓をためるには↑出費↑↓しゅっぴ↓を↑切↑↓き↓りつめないと。
sdata.e: We must cut our expenses to save money.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓かね↓の↑切↑↓き↓れ↑目↑↓め↓が↑縁↑↓えん↓の↑切↑↓き↓れ↑目↑↓め↓。
sdata.e: The end of money is the end of love.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓かね↓と↑権力↑↓けんりょく↓は、↑切↑↓き↓り↑離↑↓はな↓せない。
sdata.e: Power and money are inseparable.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓い↑内↑↓うち↓にあなたの↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓に↑恩返↑↓おんがえ↓しをしたい。
sdata.e: I would like to repay your kindness in the near future.
